title: District VI COPS to Host Adult Identification Program Seminar
body:
Who:               District
VI Commander Major Kevin Putnam                        District
VI COPS OfficersDistrict VI
Community VolunteersWhen:             Friday,
March 2, 2012Time:              10:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m.Where:           Parkview Senior Center                        9000 Briarcroft Lane                        Laurel, MarylandMembers
from the media are invited to attend.  For
more information, call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Media
Relations Division at (301) 772-4710.
